resources.string: CovidPasScanner scans the QRcode on the certification using the device\'s camera. No data read from the Certification is stored on the device being verified. \n\nIn order to use the app, you must provide consent to use the camera.

To scan, select one of the two types of Covid-19 GreenPass Certification verification: BASIC or ENHANCED. 
BASE typology: the app considers valid the green certifications generated by vaccination, healing, tampon. It is used for access to workplaces, public or private transport, closed ski resorts, accommodation facilities, health facilities, indoor sports and cultural activities, fairs and festivals, etc... 
 REINFORCED Typology: the app considers valid only green certifications generated by vaccination or healing.
It is used to access shows, sporting events, indoor dining, parties and discos, public ceremonies, etc. 
 
Detailed information on the activities allowed without/with green pass BASIC and ENHANCED (link https://www.governo.it/sites/governo.it/files/documenti/documenti/Notizie-allegati/tabella_attivita_consentite.pdf)
 
The usage detail is in the PCM table at the following link https://www.governo.it/sites/governo.it/files/documenti/documenti/Notizie-allegati/tabella_attivita_consentite.pdf

The application must connect to the network at least once to be used.
To use the application, you must update the list of revoked COVID-19 GreenPass Certifications.

You need to update the list of revoked COVID-19 GreenPass Certifications, totaling %1$.2fMB. Please check your data plan or connect to a wi-fi network before proceeding. The update time depends on your connection speed and the type of device you are using.The list will be updated every 24 hours.
The list of revoked COVID-19 GreenPass Certifications is currently being updated. Please wait for the end of the download to proceed with the scans.
To continue using the app, download the new version from the store.
